headline: Officer Is Charged With Murder in Killing of a Handcuffed Suspect
abstract: Michael Owen, a Prince Georgeâ€™s County police corporal, shot William H. Green seven times while he was handcuffed in a patrol car, the authorities said.
lead_paragraph: A police corporal in Maryland was charged with second-degree murder on Tuesday in the fatal shooting of a suspect who had been handcuffed in the front passenger seat of his patrol car the previous night, the authorities said.
keywords: Owen, Michael Jr (Prince George's County, Md, Police Officer)
